charges.charge_description: Aiding and Assisting in the Preparation of False Tax Returns(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 1: Bureau of Prisons - 18 months - Supervised Release - 1 year with special conditions imposed - Special Assessment - $100.00 due in full immediately - Restitution - $565,008.00 due in full immediately - interest waived. Recommendations by the Court: Vocational and educational opportunities - Place of incarceration at the Federal Correctional Institution - Alderson, West Virginia. Allowed to self-report as directed.
